00044 //uint MC_ADDR_BITS = 14;
00045 //uint THREAD_BITS_POSITION = 25;
00046 vector<MSHR_SA_H*> mshrHandler;
00047 bool GetNextRequest(Request *req, unsigned int *index)
00048 {
00049     bool temp = false;  
00050 
00051     //  vector<MSHR_SA_H> mshrHandler;
00052     //   mshrHandler = *mshrH;
00053     //   mshrHandler.resize(NO_OF_THREADS);
00054     static int lastThreadIndex = NO_OF_THREADS -1;
00055     vector<Time> time;
00056     time.resize(NO_OF_THREADS); 
00057     vector<bool> mshrFilled;
00058     mshrFilled.resize(NO_OF_THREADS);
00059     for (unsigned int i=0; i<NO_OF_THREADS; i++)
00060     {
00061         mshrFilled[i] = true;
00062         time[i] = -1;
00063     }    
00064     for (unsigned int i=0; i<NO_OF_THREADS; i++)
00065     {
00066         if (!mshrHandler[i]->mshr.empty())
00067         {       
00068             if ( mshrHandler[i]->lastScheduledIndex < mshrHandler[i]->mshr.size() )
00069             {
00070                 time[i] = mshrHandler[i]->mshr[mshrHandler[i]->lastScheduledIndex].arrivalTime;
00071                 temp = true;
00072                 mshrFilled[i] = false;
00073                 break;
00074             }                           
00075         }
00076         if (!mshrHandler[i]->writeQueue.empty())
00077         {       
00078             time[i] = mshrHandler[i]->writeQueue[0].arrivalTime;
00079             temp = true;
00080             break;
00081         }               
00082     }
00083     //    cout << Simulator::Now() << ":  " << temp << endl;    
00084     if (!temp)
00085         return temp;    
00086     unsigned int minTime = -1;    
00087     for (unsigned int i=0; i<NO_OF_THREADS; i++)
00088     {
00089         unsigned int rr = (i+lastThreadIndex+1)%NO_OF_THREADS;
00090         if (!mshrHandler[rr]->writeQueue.empty())
00091         {       
00092             vector<Request>::iterator bufferIndex = mshrHandler[rr]->writeQueue.begin();        
00093             *req = mshrHandler[rr]->writeQueue[0];
00094             mshrHandler[rr]->writeQueue.erase(bufferIndex);
00095             lastThreadIndex = rr;       
00096             return true;
00097         }
00098         else if (time[rr] < minTime && !mshrFilled[rr])
00099         {         
00100             minTime = time[rr];
00101             *index = rr;
00102             lastThreadIndex = *index;                   
00103             *req = mshrHandler[rr]->mshr[mshrHandler[rr]->lastScheduledIndex];
00104             temp = true;
00105         }
00106     }
00107     mshrHandler[*index]->lastScheduledIndex++;                          
00108 
00109     return temp;                        
00110 }
00111 
00112 void MC::sim_main(IrisEvent* e)
00113 {
00114     Request *req;
00115     unsigned int evType;
00116     switch (e->type)
00117     {
00118         case CONTINUE:
00119         {
00120             if (!reqH->oneBufferFull)
00121             {
00122                 unsigned int index;
00123                 req = new Request();
00124                 if (GetNextRequest(req, &index))
00125                 {
00126                     IrisEvent *e = new IrisEvent();
00127                     e->src = NULL;
00128                     e->dst = (Component*)reqH;
00129                     e->event_data.push_back((void*)req);
00130                     e->type = START;    
00131                     Simulator::Schedule(Simulator::Now()+1, &RequestHandler::process_event, (RequestHandler*)e->dst, e);
00132                     evType = CONTINUE;
00133                     break;      
00134                 }
00135                 else
00136                 {
00137                     evType = CONTINUE;
00138                     delete req;
00139                 }
00140             }
00141             else
00142             {
00143                 evType = CONTINUE;
00144             }
00145             break;
00146         }
00147     }
00148 
00149     IrisEvent *event2 = new IrisEvent();
00150     event2->type = evType;
00151     Simulator::Schedule(Simulator::Now()+1, &MC::sim_main, this, event2);
00152 
00153     delete e;
00154     return;
00155 }

00157 int main(int argc, char **argv)
00158 {
00159     init_dram_timing_parameters();
00160     //    cout << fixed << setprecision(0);
00161     cout<< "TraceNames: ";
00162     for (unsigned int i=0; i<NO_OF_THREADS; i++)
00163         cout << argv[i+1] << ", ";
00164     cout << endl;
00165 
00166     MC *mc = new MC(); 
00167     mc->Init(); 
00168     ifstream *trace_filename[NO_OF_THREADS];
00169 
00170       
00171     for (unsigned int i=0; i<NO_OF_THREADS; i++)
00172     {
00173         MSHR_SA_H *tempmshrH = new MSHR_SA_H(); 
00174         mshrHandler.push_back(tempmshrH);
00175     }
00176   
00177 //    mshrHandler.resize(NO_OF_THREADS);
00178     vector<Addr_t> addr;
00179     addr.resize(NO_OF_THREADS);
00180     vector<uint> thread_id;
00181     thread_id.resize(NO_OF_THREADS);
00182     vector<Time> time;
00183     time.resize(NO_OF_THREADS);
00184     vector<uint> cmd;
00185     cmd.resize(NO_OF_THREADS);  
00186 
00187     for (unsigned int i = 0; i<NO_OF_THREADS; i++)
00188     {
00189         mshrHandler[i]->id = i; 
00190         //        mc->stats->doneOnce[i] = &mshrHandler[i]->done; 
00191         trace_filename[i] = &mshrHandler[i]->trace_filename; 
00192         mshrHandler[i]->filename = argv[i+1];
00193     }
00194 
00195     for (unsigned int i=0; i<NO_OF_THREADS; i++)
00196     {
00197         //      trace_filename[i] = mshrHandler[i].trace_filename;
00198         (*trace_filename[i]).open(argv[i+1],ios::in);
00199         if(!(*trace_filename[i]).is_open())
00200         {
00201             cout<<"Err opening trace"<<endl;
00202             exit(1);
00203         }
00204     }   
00205 
00206     for (unsigned int i=0; i<NO_OF_THREADS; i++)
00207     {
00208         if (!(*trace_filename[i]).eof())
00209         {
00210             (*trace_filename[i]) >> hex >> addr[i];
00211             (*trace_filename[i]) >> thread_id[i];       
00212             (*trace_filename[i]) >> dec >> time[i];
00213             (*trace_filename[i]) >> dec >> cmd[i];
00214         }
00215 
00216         Request *req2 = new Request();
00217         req2->cmdType = (cache_command)cmd[i];
00218         req2->address = addr[i];
00219         req2->arrivalTime = time[i];
00220         req2->threadId = i;
00221         req2->address = mshrHandler[i]->GlobalAddrMap(req2->address,i);
00222 
00223         IrisEvent *event = new IrisEvent();
00224         event->src = NULL;
00225         event->dst = (Component*)(mshrHandler[i]);
00226         event->event_data.push_back(req2);      
00227 #ifdef DEEP_DEBUG
00228         cout << dec << Simulator::Now() << ": " << hex << req2->address << ": First Request of each trace to be send to mshrs" << endl; 
00229 #endif
00230         Simulator::Schedule(time[i], &MSHR_SA_H::process_event, (MSHR_SA_H*)event->dst, event);   
00231     }   
00232 
00233     IrisEvent *event2 = new IrisEvent();
00234     event2->type = CONTINUE;
00235     Simulator::Schedule(Simulator::Now()+1, &MC::sim_main, mc, event2);
00236 
00237     for (unsigned int i = 0; i<NO_OF_THREADS; i++)
00238     {
00239         mshrHandler[i]->globalUnSink += mshrHandler[i]->unsink;
00240     }   
00241 
00242 
00243     Simulator::StopAt(max_sim_time);
00244     Simulator::Run();
00245 
00246     mc->stats->CalculateAggregateStats();
00247     cerr << mc->stats->PrintAggregateStats(0);
00248 
00249     delete mc;  
00250     return 0;
00251 }
